name: Bit Platformer: Geometry Run
description:
👾 BIT PLATFORMER: GEOMETRY RUN 👾

✅ You are in luck, this game is for you.

✅ This retro-themed game is perfect for people who like challenges.

💎 Get as many diamonds as possible during the levels.

💰 Get as many coins as possible during the levels.

📈 Compete with other players to move up the global points ranking.

🎓 Available languages:

- English

- Spanish

- Italian

- Portuguese 

- French

- German
